title.rendered: GROUNDBREAKING CEREMONY OF GRAND BAY HALONG COMPLEX PROJECT HELD BY NEWTECONS

content.rendered:
[On September 14, 2022, Quang Ninh] The Grand Bay Ha Long Complex project’s official groundbreaking ceremony was hosted by Newtecons and BIMLand. Distinguished visitors from the Investor, Artelia Supervision Consultant, General Contractor, Supliers, and Sub-contractors were present at the event.

The Grand Bay Halong Complex project is located on peninsula 3, Halong Marina tourism urban area, Bai Chay ward, Ha Long city, Quang Ninh province. The project takes the form of a bow, capturing all of the poetic beauty of the sky, and is located next to the world’s natural wonder, Ha Long Bay. It is located on 7.8 hectares of land and is surrounded by 475 meters of coastline. The project, which is scheduled to be finished in the third quarter of 2023 with Newtecons is at the General Contractor position.

Speaking at the event, Mr. Le Duc Buu, the Managing Director of Newtecons, said: “With extensive experience in implementing projects with strict quality requirements from many domestic and foreign partners, Newtecons will meet the requirements of the project and coordinate well with the Investor, the Supervision Consultant to complete on schedule, quality, and safety.”

According to Mr. Francis A. Nuñez Jr., a representative of the investor, the project is anticipated to provide clients with a private, opulent, and elegant living area in the most desirable position in Ha Long Bay. While doing so, he also expressed his confidence in choosing Newtecons as the general contractor for the project. With experience building numerous significant and noticeable projects in Vietnam, Newtecons will finish the Grand Bay Halong Complex project on schedule, guaranteeing worker safety and being environmentally responsible. This is also a good start, tightening the cooperation relationship between the parties.

With a professional and dynamic team, the Newtecons Site Management Team is committed to finishing the project on time, with the highest level of technical and aesthetic achievement as well as Investor satisfaction. At the moment, construction plans have been promptly created and implemented, and equipment and human resources have also been carefully prepared.

Some photos from the event:
